GSD.description:
xtensa: xtfpga: Fix refcount leak bug in setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 9b30c5c8884eda3f541229899671cebbad15979b. For more details please see the references link.
